Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cut into cubes.
Combine cornstarch and soy sauce in a bowl. Add tofu cubes and toss to coat.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, rice vinegar, water, garlic, and ginger. Bring to a simmer until sugar dissolves.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Arrange tofu cubes on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
While tofu bakes, stir in sesame oil to the teriyaki sauce.
Toss cooked tofu in teriyaki sauce to coat.
